name: ZOG Digital
tag_list: digital-marketing, seo, smo, paid-media, search-engine-optimization, social-media-optimization, search-marketing, digital-solutions, content-marketing, widgets, applications
alias_list: Zog Media, Zog Media Inc., ZooLoo
overview:
WE ARE A SEARCH & SOCIAL MARKETING TECHNOLOGY COMPANY.

ZOG Digital’s proven success model is based on making the right connections through search engine optimization, social media optimization, paid media, widgets and apps.

Our digital marketing solutions increase online visibility, engagement, sales and ROI; and results are quantified through a proprietary Analytics Platform.

We’ve been pioneering and perfecting our solutions for a long time — over 15 years in fact. Along the way we’ve helped more than 50 Fortune 500 clients achieve their goals, and in the process built and sold the world’s largest independent search marketing agency. Then our passion for digital led us to do it all again.

Today, ZOG Digital drives results for leading brands including Allstate, BVLGARI, and Fiesta Bowl. Our company was founded in 2011 by award winning innovator, Jeffrey Herzog, and is located in Scottsdale, Arizona.

When asked the secret to our success, our answer is: we keep it simple. Connect with the right audience and measure the results.

Give us a call and we’ll show you how simple digital marketing success can be.
